name: TwoCups Sprint 7 - Technical Debt & Polish
description: Address technical debt, improve reliability, add offline support, and prepare for production release

decisions.D1_Offline: Use Firestore persistence for offline support
decisions.D2_ErrorBoundary: React error boundaries with fallback UI
decisions.D3_Testing: Focus on critical path testing, not 100% coverage

userStories.title: App Icon and Splash Screen
userStories.description: Create and configure app icon and splash screen for Android.
acceptanceCriteria: App icon designed (Two Cups theme)
Icon configured for all Android densities
Splash screen shows app logo on launch
Splash screen transitions smoothly to app
No white flash between splash and app

userStories.title: Replace 'any' Types with Proper TypeScript Types
userStories.description: Eliminate 'any' types throughout the codebase for better type safety.
acceptanceCriteria: All 10+ instances of 'any' type identified and replaced
Proper interfaces/types defined where needed
TypeScript strict mode passes without errors
No runtime regressions introduced

userStories.title: Fix Type Mismatches Between Functions and Mobile
userStories.description: Align Suggestion and Request interfaces between Cloud Functions and mobile app.
acceptanceCriteria: Shared type definitions between functions and mobile
Suggestion interface consistent across codebase
Request interface consistent across codebase
TypeScript compilation passes in both projects

userStories.title: Input Validation Improvements
userStories.description: Add comprehensive input validation with max lengths, email regex, and sanitization.
acceptanceCriteria: Max length validation on all text inputs
Proper email regex validation
Input sanitization to prevent injection
Validation error messages are user-friendly
Server-side validation matches client-side

userStories.title: Fix Silent Failures
userStories.description: Replace empty catch blocks with proper error handling.
acceptanceCriteria: All empty catch blocks identified and fixed
Errors logged to Crashlytics or handled appropriately
User notified when operations fail
No silent swallowing of errors
userStories.blockedReason: Depends on US-062 (Crashlytics) for proper error logging

userStories.title: Optimize Animation Performance
userStories.description: Pre-calculate random values and optimize animations for smooth 60fps.
acceptanceCriteria: Random values pre-calculated before animation starts
No random calculations during animation frames
Animations run at consistent 60fps
Memory usage stable during animations
No dropped frames on mid-range devices
